titles.title: To make permanent the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to conduct the quarterly financial report program.
An Act to provide for the reauthorization of the collection and publication of quaterly financial statistics by the Secretary of Commerce through fiscal year 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1703)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Census, Statistics and Postal Personnel.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Subcommittee on Census, Statistics and Postal Personnel Discharged.
Reported by the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service. H. Rept. 103-241.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 132.

action.text: Mr. Sawyer moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.
Amendment SP 942 proposed by Senator Mitchell for Senator Lieberman.
Amendment SP 942 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Sawyer asked unanimous consent that the House agree to the Senate amendments.

vote.text: On motion that the House agree to the Senate amendments Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/22/1993--Passed Senate amended. Amends Federal law to extend through FY 1998 the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to conduct the quarterly financial report program.
